story_29_05000/2401_1001_0300_10: I’m sorry, young master! I-it was my fault!
story_29_05000/2401_1001_0400_10:
If I’d been able to support you better...
I could have—
story_29_05000/2401_1001_0500_10:
No waaay! I’m the one who botched it for us!
If my feints had been better, we coulda
outmaneuvered ’em...
story_29_05000/2401_1001_0700_10: What are you two apologizing for? I’m not angry.
story_29_05000/2401_1001_0900_10:
You both did well. Better than I ever could have
hoped for.
story_29_05000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Besides, the PML is a team competition, isn’t it?
Every triumph is a team triumph. The same goes
for the opposite.
story_29_05000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Every loss is a team loss, so don’t put all of the
blame on yourself when things go wrong.
story_29_05000/2401_1001_1300_10:
*sniffle* Sorry! Don’t mind meee... Just gonna
need a minute to, like, stop myself from crying,
that’s all...
story_29_05000/2401_1001_1500_10: I’m just so proud of you.
story_29_05000/2401_1001_1800_10: No wonder we’re friends! Heh... Thank you.
story_29_05000/2401_1001_1900_10:
And [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
The fact that I lost vexes me to no end!
But I will state for the record...
story_29_05000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Victory belongs to you and your team today!
And that means that you’ll be taking my place in
the finals!
story_29_05000/2401_0401_2200_10:
Don’t thank me! You’ll make me feel even worse!
Anyways...
story_29_05000/2401_0402_2400_10:
Hush! No getting mushy on me! You just won the
semifinals. Hold your head high and be proud!
story_29_05000/2401_1001_2500_10:
One more thing. And listen closely, because I’m
only going to say this once!
story_29_05000/2401_1001_2600_10:
When we were battling each other a minute ago...
for the first time in a really long time...
story_29_05000/2401_1001_2900_10:
For some reason, I’ve always felt so irritated
by you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_29_05000/2401_1001_3000_10:
I used to think it was because you and your silly
little hat reminded me of Red...but now I think I
understand what was really bothering me.
story_29_05000/2401_1001_3100_10:
You truly believe in the people and Pokémon
around you.
story_29_05000/2401_1001_3200_10:
And when you’re battling, you look like you’re
having more fun than anyone else.
story_29_05000/2401_1001_3300_10:
And...I think deep down, I might have been
jealous of that.
story_29_05000/2401_1001_3400_10:
That’s why you’ve always picked on
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
story_29_05000/2401_1001_3500_10:
But now you know what it feels like to have that
kind of fun, too.
story_29_05000/2401_1001_3800_10:
If I had to name one reason why we lost the
match today, that would probably be it.
story_29_05000/2401_1001_3900_10:
You all discovered the joy of Pokémon battling
long before I did.
story_29_05000/2401_1001_4000_10:
And you’ve had far more time than I have to
develop the power of your sync stones.
story_29_05000/2401_1001_4100_10:
Other than that, I’ve got nothing! So that must be
the reason!
story_29_05000/2401_0402_4500_10: Absolutely! There could be no other explanation!
story_29_05000/2401_1001_4600_10:
But know this—I’m not going to quit just because
I lost one match!
story_29_05000/2401_1001_4700_10:
I’m going to form an even tighter bond with my
team! Mark my words—the next time we battle,
I’m going to win!
story_29_05000/2401_1001_4900_10:
Tsk! The least you could do is react a little!
What’s the point of cackling if no one’s even
paying attention!
story_29_05000/2401_1001_5000_10:
Fine! I’m done talking! Come on, you two.
We’re leaving!
story_29_05000/2401_1001_5400_10: Lear sure was tough, wasn’t he.
story_29_05000/2401_1001_5500_10: He’s always had a lot of talent.
story_29_05000/2401_1001_5600_10:
If he’d known how much fun Pokémon battling
is all this time, that match might have gone
a bit differently.
story_29_05000/2401_1001_5700_10:
If that were the case, I think it would have been
even more fun!
story_29_05000/2401_0401_6000_10:
Yeah! I bet our next battle with Lear’s team is
gonna be superduper awesome!
story_29_05000/2401_0302_6100_10:
Yeah! Our next battle is gonna
be awesome!
story_29_05000/2401_0402_6200_10:
Totally! I mean, did you see how gung ho Lear
was about it just now? It’s gonna be great!
story_29_05000/2401_1001_6300_10:
At any rate, we should all give ourselves a pat
on the back. We made it to the finals!
story_29_05000/2401_1001_6400_10:
Whether we win or lose, we made it all the way
to the end!
story_29_05000/2401_1001_6500_10:
Speaking of which, it looks like our opponents
have arrived.
